QuestData.Title: Running Their Course
QuestData.Description: I'd love so much to save every creature in the forest, but as you probably have seen, some are just too far gone.$B$BWhen we first founded Whisperwind Grove, the woods just to the south were full of beautiful coursers, majestic and gentle creatures. The corruption here hasn't made them violent, but they've wasted away to nearly nothing.$B$BEven if they were cleansed, they would know only pain and suffering. Please, $c, help put them down for me.
QuestData.CompletionText: I wish I could bring myself to help the poor things. It's just so sad.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. They won't spread the corruption any further, and they won't be in pain either.
